name: SetPlayerRaceCheckpoint
warnings: Race checkpoints are asynchronous, meaning only one can be shown at a time. To 'stream' race checkpoints (only show them when players are close enough), use a race checkpoint streamer.
description: Creates a race checkpoint. When the player enters it, the OnPlayerEnterRaceCheckpoint callback is called.
params_title: (playerid, type, Float:x, Float:y, Float:z, Float:nextx, Float:nexty, Float:nextz, Float:size)

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to set the checkpoint for

params_body.name: type
params_body.description: Type of checkpoint.0-Normal, 1-Finish, 2-Nothing(Only the checkpoint without anything on it), 3-Air normal, 4-Air finish, 5-Air (rotates and stops), 6-Air (increases, decreases and disappears), 7-Air (swings down and up), 8-Air (swings up and down)

params_body.name: Float:nextx
params_body.description: X-Coordinate of the next point, for the arrow facing direction

params_body.name: Float:nexty
params_body.description: Y-Coordinate of the next point, for the arrow facing direction

params_body.name: Float:nextz
params_body.description: Z-Coordinate of the next point, for the arrow facing direction

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player specified does not exist.
related_fn:
SetPlayerCheckpoint: Create a checkpoint for a player.
 DisablePlayerCheckpoint: Disable the player's current checkpoint.
 IsPlayerInCheckpoint: Check if a player is in a checkpoint.
 DisablePlayerRaceCheckpoint: Disable the player's current race checkpoint.
 IsPlayerInRaceCheckpoint: Check if a player is in a race checkpoint.
 OnPlayerEnterCheckpoint: Called when a player enters a checkpoint.
 OnPlayerLeaveCheckpoint: Called when a player leaves a checkpoint.
 OnPlayerEnterRaceCheckpoint: Called when a player enters a race checkpoint.
 OnPlayerLeaveRaceCheckpoint: Called when a player leaves a race checkpoint.
